original_text: But they will not continue to do many more bad things. Everyone will see clearly that they are fools. That is what happened to Jannes and Jambres.
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 더 나아가지 못할 것은 저 두 사람이 된 것과 같이 그들의 어리석음이 드러날 것임이라

sentences.original_text: But they will not continue to do many more bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 더 이상 많은 나쁜 일들을 계속하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what happened to Jannes and Jambres.
